# Scraping Data

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml"
html <- read_html(url)
newdata <- html %>% html_table(fill=TRUE)
head(newdata)

install.packages("Lahman")
library(Lahman)
head(HallOfFame)
head(People)

combinedHOF <- left_join(HallOfFame, People, by = "playerID")

combinedHOF %>% 
  rename(Name = nameGiven)


```
